channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Minneapolis protesters vent their outrage after an ICE officer kills a woman
item.description: Minneapolis is on edge following the fatal shooting of a woman by an Immigration and Customs Enforcement officer taking part in the Trump administration’s latest immigration crackdown.

item.title: Minneapolis shooting by ICE agent brings debate over police force and moving vehicles back in focus
ICE shooting reinforces Minnesota’s grim role as Trump’s public enemy No. 1
